title: Zendesk HTTP
description:
Zendesk HTTP integration with OAuth

Known issues / potential enhancements:
1) Localisation is done only for English
2) Ticket tags are not supported
3) If Update Status needs to be amended with changes of other items than additional buttons with different API calls needs to introduces (E.G.: priority cannot be part of the call if it has an empty value)
4) Tickets with "status": "deleted" would be better to remove from synchronisation
